allow: Bash(PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS=native node -e "const { PrismaClient } = require(''@prisma/client''); const prisma = new PrismaClient(); prisma.project.findMany().then(projects => { console.log(''Projetos encontrados:'', projects.length); console.log(projects); }).catch(err => console.error(err)).finally(() => prisma.$disconnect());")
